snippet: For the first time since shutting down all the country’s nuclear power plants after the Fukushima disaster last year, Japan restarted a reactor, despite public protests.
abstract: Japan reactivates a nuclear reactor for the first time since the Fukushima disaster in 2011, despite public protests.
lead_paragraph: For the first time since shutting down all the country’s nuclear power plants after the Fukushima disaster last year, Japan restarted a reactor, despite public protests.

headline.main: In Japan, First Reactor Is Restarted Since Quake
headline.print_headline: In Japan, First Reactor Is Restarted Since Quake
